title: Bloomberg's Crooks: Coca-Cola Halting Ops in Venezuela (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Crooks: Coca-Cola Halting Ops in Venezuela (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Nathan Crooks, Caracas Bureau Chief for Bloomberg, on sugar being so scarce in Venezuela that Coca-Cola will stop production.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
